title: Танька і Володька
overview: "Tanka and Volodka" is a sketch about the life of a couple of lovers from Ternopil. Tanka is a brave girl with a strong character who sometimes allows herself to be naughty. Volodka is a tractor driver who's in love with her up to his ears, and he readily fulfills all the whims of his beloved. But if there is a conflict or misunderstanding between lovers, they always find a funny and original way to make up.
